alert.note: Alert for Clay; Fillmore; Nuckolls; Thayer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 12:22AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Clay, northeastern Nuckolls, Fillmore and Thayer Counties through 100 AM CDT... At 1221 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking an outflow boundary from strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ong to near Belvidere to near Chester. Movement was northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Bruning and Belvidere around 1225 AM CDT. Gilead and Strang around 1230 AM CDT. Geneva, Alexandria and Ohiowa around 1235 AM CDT. Fairmont and Milligan around 1240 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Exeter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
